name: Mint Tea Blend
description: A calming and cooling blend of the finest organic herbs. Three types of Mint over Chamomile and Rose Hips makes this blend a wonderful after meal tea. Enjoy this relaxing blend in the evenings to help you unwind. Ingredients: Peppermint, Spearmint, Lemon Balm, Chamomile, Oat Tops, Rose Hips Bajrang Herb Teas are carefully crafted blends that are deeply nourishing and distinctly delicious. Our teas are consciously created to support vitality and well-being. We blend only the finest organic herbs (grown by us, ethically wildcrafted or fairly sourced) in small batches to ensure the highest artisan quality. We recommend one tablespoon of loose leaf herb per cup (8-12 oz water). Steep covered for 5+ minutes.

name: Ginger Tea Blend
description:
Warm up with this deeply nutritious Ginger Tea offering - a unique blend of herbs traditionally used to vitalize the digestion, circulation, and lungs.  

Ingredients: Ginger, Rose Hips, Astragalus, Lemon Balm, Fenugreek, Oat Tops, Sweet Cinnamon

Bajrang Herb Teas are carefully crafted blends that are deeply nourishing and distinctly delicious. Our teas are consciously created to support vitality and well-being. We blend only the finest organic herbs (grown by us, ethically wildcrafted or fairly sourced) in small batches to ensure the highest artisan quality.

We recommend one teaspoon of loose leaf herb per cup (8oz water). Steep covered for 5+ minutes.

name: Mineral Tea Blend
description:
A unique and deeply nutritious blend of broad spectrum mineral rich herbs - traditionally used to support bone growth and strength by providing deep vitamin and mineral nourishment to the kidneys and core.  

Ingredients: Nettles, Oat Tops, Red Clover, Horsetail, Parsley, Alfalfa, Oatstraw, Rose Hips

Bajrang Herb Teas are carefully crafted blends that are deeply nourishing and distinctly delicious. Our teas are consciously created to support vitality and well-being. We blend only the finest organic herbs (grown by us, ethically wildcrafted or fairly sourced) in small batches to ensure the highest artisan quality.

We recommend one tablespoon of loose leaf herb per cup (8-12 oz water). Steep covered for 5+ minutes.

name: Nettles Tea Blend
description:
An energizing and centering blend, providing deep nutrition from herbs traditionally used to support the kidneys, liver and nervous system.
